page.title: 02My School in Sarn
page.content: The school is situated in{Powys}on the Shropshire border.It is a small church school with 34 pupils in two classes, one infant and one Junior.A few children come to school on bicycles, some come on a taxi,and others come with their mums.The school has a hall, two classrooms,a library,toilets and a staffroom.Outside there is a playground and an orchard where we climb the trees.We start school at 9am and finish at 3.30pm.We learn all the usual{subjects}like reading,writing, science and mathematics.We go swimming in Newtown every Monday afternoon.The hall is used for morning service, midday dinner,P.E. and music.Every year we have a School Trip.We present services in church for Harvest, Christmas and Easter.The school was built in 1868 and enlarged in 1970.
